body_html: I ran the test locally with python 2 and found that the test was failing due to some case for which numpy gave nan and tf gave inf. I have changed the test cases so that this does not happen. The test passes on my machine with python2 now.
body_text: I ran the test locally with python 2 and found that the test was failing due to some case for which numpy gave nan and tf gave inf. I have changed the test cases so that this does not happen. The test passes on my machine with python2 now.
body: I ran the test locally with python 2 and found that the test was failing due to some case for which numpy gave `nan` and tf gave `inf`. I have changed the test cases so that this does not happen. The test passes on my machine with python2 now.
